title: Sports teams?
content: Soâ€¦Iâ€™m gonna be joining PESU in like two weeks, and I just wanted to know if the university has something along the lines of sports teamsâ€¦say a football team for example?

comments.body: Yes it has, They hold trials around September.

Our chancellor very much loves and endorses badminton. He would fall for it.  
On a serious note: yes, we have teams. [http://sports.pes.edu/facilities/](http://sports.pes.edu/facilities/)
